title: BRIEF-MTN Ghana Says Nine-Month Service Revenue Up 22.7% To GH¢ 3,723 Mln
text:
BRIEF-MTN Ghana Says Nine-Month Service Revenue Up 22.7% To GH¢ 3,723 Mln

Stock Markets 14 minutes ago (Oct 30, 2019 14:18)

© Reuters. BRIEF-MTN Ghana Says Nine-Month Service Revenue Up 22.7% To GH¢ 3,723 Mln Oct 30 (Reuters) - MTN Group Ltd : * MTN GHANA UNAUDITED RESULTS FOR THE NINE-MONTH PERIOD ENDED 30 SEPTEMBER 2019 * MTN GHANA NINE-MONTH SERVICE REVENUE INCREASED BY 22.7% TO GH¢ 3,723 MILLION * MTN GHANA NINE-MONTH SUBSCRIBERS INCREASED BY 1.1% TO 21.6 MILLION * MTN GHANA NINE-MONTH EBITDA UP BY 63.0% TO GH¢ 1,875 MILLION (UP BY 35.1% TO GH¢ 1,553 MILLION UNDER IAS 17) * MTN GHANA NINE-MONTH IAS 17 PROFIT BEFORE TAX GH¢ 1,068 MILLION VERSUS GH¢ 848 MILLION

BRIEF-MTN Ghana Says Nine-Month Service Revenue Up 22.7% To GH¢ 3,723 Mln
description: BRIEF-MTN Ghana Says Nine-Month Service Revenue Up 22.7% To GH¢ 3,723 Mln
